Packages 
Package Description
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.string
Contains text similarity measures that operate solely on the string representations of texts (GPL variant).
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexsub
Contains text similarity measures that are based on lexical substitution.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.gloss
Contains text similarity measures that are based on comparisons of the glosses of two words that are part of a given lexical-semantic resources.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.sspace
Contains text similarity measures that are based the S-Space Package (David Jurgens and Keith Stevens, 2010).
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.sspace.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro
Contains the core DKPro components for text similarity computation which are necessary to integration text similarity measures with a DKPro pipeline.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource
Contains the external resources which wrap the text similarity measures for use in a DKPro pipeline.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.lexsub  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.lsr  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.ml  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.dkpro.resource.vsm  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.coling2012
Contains the experimental setup as used in (BÃ¤r, Zesch, and Gurevych, 2012).
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.coling2012.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.rte
Contains a full-featured experimental setup for text similarity experiments on the data from the Recognizing Textual Entailment (RTE) Challenges.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.rte.attic  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.rte.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.sts2013
Contains the full-featured experimental setup for the Semantic Textual Similarity (STS) Task at the 2nd Joint Conference on Lexical and Computational Semantics.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.sts2013.filter  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.sts2013.util  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.sts2013baseline
Contains the full-featured experimental setup which served as a baseline for the Semantic Textual Similarity (STS) Task at the 2nd Joint Conference on Lexical and Computational Semantics.
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.sts2013baseline.example  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.sts2013baseline.filter  
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.experiments.sts2013baseline.util
